name: StratoSphere (anthem software)
description:
Tutorial for the game is in the Downloadable File

this game is for the Bullet Hell Shooter game jam
i tried to mix a bullethell with a RPG(with characters, weapons and equipment)
sadly didn't have time to make more then one character, and music(tho if my composer friend finish some music i will add a alternative version with the music)
i also choose not to follow the theme of the game jam

hope you enjoy the game
